segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the potential for an accident here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that unstable stool could fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's so eager, but she might slip on the wet floor too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't see any of it, just focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out, ruining the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands right in the puddle, unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies are tempting them into this risk, poor kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene, but inside it's all wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the family if something goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet makes it all seem so accessible yet hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby could break if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This obliviousness to the chaos just tugs at my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR
